document_data.mainbody:
reymace was the majordomo for the noble Seasilver family of Marsember during the late 15 century DR.
Greymace had a hooked nose with eyes that were set close to one another. He wore fine robes of velvet, emblazoned with the sigil of House Seasilver.
Befitting his rank, Greymace had a commanding air that was evident every time he stepped into a room.
On Uktar 2 of the , the city of Marsember was assaulted by shades during Netherils invasion of Cormyr. Greymace was able to accompany Grand Duke Farnig Seasilver aboard the Wave Wyvern during the conflict, sailing away from the city. Unfortunately, the Duke Seasilver was slain shortly thereafter, though Greymaces fate was unknown.
